jobDescription: #GD We are looking for reliable JOURNEYMAN LEVEL ELECTRICIANSand HELPERS/APPRENTICESfor a project in Sterling Heights, Michigan.ResponsibilitiesInstall, maintain, and enhance electrical systems and components, including fuses, lights, and wiringInspect, test, and diagnose issues with electrical systems and componentsPerform all work in a manner that meets and follows electrical codes, blueprints, and standardsTest electrical systems and components to ensure proper functioningComplete required documentation of repairs and service informationEnsure adequate inventory of necessary supplies and partsCalibrate equipment to provided specificationsPeform preventative maintenance on electrical systems and componentsTroubleshoot problems and make timely repairs MUST BE ABLE TO PASS DRUG SCREEN AND BACKGROUND CHECK!!MUST HAVE LICENSE AND VEHICLE!!MUST HAVE YOUR OWN ELECTRICAL TOOLS!PLEASE RESPOND WITH A RESUME!!
